text: The New Klondike is a 1926 American silent romantic comedy movie directed by Lewis Milestone and starring Thomas Meighan, Lila Lee, Paul Kelly, Tefft Johnson, Hallie Manning. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * The New Klondike at IMDB * The New Klondike at SilentEra * The New Klondike at AllMovie Category:1926 comedy movies Category:1920s American romance movies Category:1920s romantic comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:Movies set in Florida
title: The New Klondike
